content: अनुषंगिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Connected with, adhering or sticking to; अनीकजे रजसि मुखानुषंगिणि <ls>Śi. 17. 57.</ls> {@--2@} Following as a necessary consequence; यस्यानुषंगिण इमे भोगादयो भवंति <ls>Bh. 3. 76.</ls> {@--3@} Related or applicable to, common, prevailing (अनुक्षणं प्रसक्त); सप्तकस्यास्य वर्गस्य सर्वत्रैवानुषंगिणः <ls>Ms. 7. 52</ls>; विभुतानुषंगि भयमेति जनः <ls>Ki. 6. 35</ls> connected with, natural to, greatness. {@--4@} Addicted to, devoted or attached to, fond of.
